mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brd_comment (brd_id, mem_id, brd_cmt_reply,mem_nickname, brd_cmt_contents, brd_cmt_datetime,brd_cmt_updatetime, brd_cmt_state) VALUES (#{brd_id},#{mem_id},#{brd_cmt_reply}, #{mem_nickname},#{brd_cmt_contents},NOW(),NOW(),#{brd_cmt_state})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM brd_comment WHERE brd_cmt_state = 0 AND brd_id = #{brd_id} AND brd_cmt_reply ='0') b ORDER BY brd_cmt_datetime DESC LIMIT #{pagenum}, #{pagecount};
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM brd_comment WHERE brd_cmt_state = 0 AND brd_cmt_reply = #{brd_cmt_reply}) b ORDER BY brd_cmt_datetime DESC;
mapper.update: update brd_comment set brd_cmt_contents = #{brd_cmt_contents}, brd_cmt_state = #{brd_cmt_state}, brd_cmt_updatetime = NOW() where brd_cmt_id = #{brd_cmt_id}
update brd_comment set brd_cmt_state = 1 where brd_cmt_id = #{brd_cmt_id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_comment WHERE brd_id=#{brd_id} AND brd_cmt_reply=0
mapper.update: update brd_comment set brd_cmt_replynum = brd_cmt_replynum +1 where brd_cmt_id = #{brd_cmt_id}
